title: A Place to live [Turkish version]
creator_credit: Stuart Glover, Frank Bagnall and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: A film made for immigrants to Australia illustrating the kinds of housing, styles, building materials, costs, locations etc of houses in Australia. Note: In Turkish.
